summary: This is an email from a US Attorney's Office (likely Southern District of New York) staff member to a colleague, requesting follow-up with Jeffrey Epstein's estate to obtain photos and to notify the estate of an impending subpoena for passenger manifests from Epstein's planes. It indicates ongoing investigative efforts after Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as the deceased whose estate is being contacted for photos and passenger manifests from his planes as part of an ongoing investigation.

events.title: Email Request for Estate Follow-up
events.description: A US Attorney's Office staff member emails a colleague to request they contact Jeffrey Epstein's estate to follow up on obtaining photos and to flag an impending subpoena for passenger manifests from Epstein's planes.

keyFacts: As of January 2021, the US Attorney's Office was actively seeking photos and passenger manifests from Jeffrey Epstein's estate.
The office planned to serve a subpoena on Epstein's estate specifically for passenger manifests from his planes.
The communication indicates investigative efforts into Epstein's activities, particularly air travel, continued after his death.
